title: [RIDGELINE] Walking TOKIO TŌKYŌ TOKYO<sup>²</sup> — Winter Edition
content:
Ridgeliners —
2023 is here, and I come bearing a new pop-up newsletter: TOKIO TŌKYŌ TOKYO² — Winter Walk Edition. It runs for a week starting on January 16, 2023, finishing on January 23.
Five months ago, during the peak of summer heat, I ran the first TOKIO TŌKYŌ TOKYO newsletter. Despite sweating some five liters each day, I had a blast. It reminded me of many things — not the least of which being my complex twenty-three year history with the city — but mostly it reminded me of how much I love Tokyo.
